Class Bomber

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bomber

  • public class Bomber
extends java.lang.Object
    A stripped down version of BomberMan that is used by the Client. Contains information about the Bomber's current position, bomb range and bomb count.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int bombCount
      The current numbers of bombs Bomber have available.
      int bombRange
      The current range of the Bomber.
      int playerIndex
      The player index for Bomber.
      java.awt.Point position
      The current position of Bomber.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bomber(java.awt.Point position, int playerIndex, int bombRange, int bombCount) 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • playerIndex

        public final int playerIndex
        The player index for Bomber.

      • bombRange

        public int bombRange
        The current range of the Bomber. Can be changed for simulation purposes, but changes won't be reflected in the actual game.

      • bombCount

        public int bombCount
        The current numbers of bombs Bomber have available. Can be changed for simulation purposes, but changes won't be reflected in the actual game.

      • position

        public java.awt.Point position
        The current position of Bomber. Can be changed for simulation purposes, but changes won't be reflected in the actual game.
